SKT_FIRST.name: Investment Shot
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> chance to increase the target's <color=#28d9ed>Ultimate Skill cooldown</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>必殺スキルのターン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>増加させる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>필살기 쿨타임</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>的几率使目标的<color=#28d9ed>必杀技冷却时间</color>减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

2_jp: スキル使用時、命中UP+2ターン
2_zh: 使用技能时命中提升+2回合
3_jp: 効果命中発動確率増加+15%
3_zh: 效果命中发动概率提升+15%
5_jp: 効果命中発動確率増加+20%
5_zh: 效果命中发动概率提升+20%

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Settling the Balance
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>스턴</color> 상태로 만듭니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>的几率使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>晕眩</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases Effectiveness Increase by +1 turn after attacking
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 攻撃後、効果命中UP+1ターン
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 攻击后,效果命中提升+1回合

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases Effectiveness Increase duration by +1 turn

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Increases Effectiveness Increase duration before attacking
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 攻撃前、効果命中UPに変更
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 공격 전 효과 적중 증가로 변경
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 攻击前变更为效果命中提升

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>2</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from the target.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、APを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2個</color>解除する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>25</color> 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,使自身的AP恢复<color=#28d9ed>25</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>的几率解除目标的<color=#28d9ed>2个</color><color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
